events.name: San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders
events.description: The San Gabriel Mountains Trailbuilders work the 1st, 3rd, and 5th Saturday of every month, and we work special projects which are not scheduled. Please email us to get on to the mailinglist to keep informed about scheduled and special projects! Email Ben atbwootenwhite@hotmail.com

events.name: MWBA Dig Day on Brown Mountain
events.description: Help MWBA maintain the trails above Pasadena! RSVP required here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/mwba-may-dig-day-on-upper-brown-mountain-tickets-291616862887?aff=Linktree

events.name: Rubio Canyon Trail Work
events.description: Beginners welcome. The group meets every other Saturday at 8AM in Altadena. See here for more details https://www.signupgenius.com/go/10c0f4aabae2ba4ffc61-volunteer2

events.name: LoweLifes trail work and an overnight camp at West Fork campground.
events.description:
Two weekends from now – April 30 - May 1 – we will be back in there hosting volunteers for two days of trail work and an overnight camp at West Fork campground. We'd love to have you along: join us!

The access to West Fork Campground along 2N24 is about 5.5 miles and 1,600 feet downhill from Red Box (Highway 2 at Mt Wilson Rd), so be ready to ride or hike that distance on Saturday morning and Sunday afternoon. Water is easily accessible from the campsite – bring your filter.
Lowelifes will supply the tools, safety gear, training, and coordination! Email us to RSVP, and let us know any questions you may have.

board@lowelifesrcc.org
